content: corrugated basket by alecia hornfeldt these simple yet sturdy baskets are great yarnie storage options the tightly knit doubled fabric on the sides means they stand up on their own and can be picked up with items inside them they re knit in the round folded over and joined to form the sides then decreased for the bottom i would love to see your projects tag your wips and fos #aleciahknits on instagram find me on instagram@aleciahknits small large 14 5 26 5 | 37cm 67 5cm outer circumference size 12 24 | 30 5cm 61cm inner circumference 1 75 3 5 | 4 5cm 9cm tall 1 2 skeins of cascade reboundor yarn approximately 70 250 yards | 65 230 meters ofcomparable aran-weight yarn 164 yards per 100g | 150 metersper 100g 21 sts and 27 row over 4 | 10cm in stockinette gauge this firm of a gauge gives the baskets structure be mindful of your hands especially if your yarn has any cotton likethe sample the fabric is sturdy but a bit tough to knit -size us5 | 3 75mm needles for knitting in the round or size needed materials to obtain gauge -yarn needle to weave in ends skills magic loop or otherwise knitting in the round knit purl decreasing - 1 - corrugated basket copyright alecia hornfeldt 2021 working a folded brim for mittens or a hat directions but the cast on edge is held to the outside instead of the inside body of the basket cast on 64 128 sts if you don t enjoy knit around knitting the cast on edge picking up stitches consider a provisional together with the current round as cast on follows join in the round placing a marker to insert your right needle through the first note the beginning of the round and work stitch from the cast on edge then insert in garter stitch as follows your right needle into the next stitch on your left needle knit these two stitches round 1 purl around together round 2 knit around continue around picking up the next continue in garter stitch until the work stitch from the cast on edge and knitting it measures 1 75 3 5 | 4 5cm 9cm from together with the next stitch on your left the cast on edge ending with a purl needle round bottom of the basket if you would like to add a bit more height knit 6 12 rounds to your basket now is the time keep track of when you stop knitting garter k2tog around -32 64 sts remaining stitch the stockinette section needs to be about 0 25 | 0 5cm longer than the knit 3 6 rounds garter stitch section k2tog around -16 32 sts remaining knit straight until the work measures 3 75 7 25 | 9 5cm 18 5cm from the knit 1 3 rounds cast on edge k2tog around -8 16 sts remaining joining the sides you will now fold your work
